## Biography

Sarah Fogerty is a Data Science student at Simmons University in Boston, MA. She has 1 year experience with Python and R. Before transferring to Simmons University, she completed a research project studying antibiotics in a microbiology lab with Aquinas College (Grand Rapids). A music lover her whole life, she started collecting vinyl records when she was 12 years old. In her free time, Sarah enjoys playing guitar, reading, and exploring Boston.
